statements: SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment_records;
SELECT course_name, grades FROM student_enrollment_records;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, course_name, grades FROM student_enrollment_records;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment_records WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM student_enrollment_records ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date, course_id, course_name, grades FROM student_enrollment_records WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grades FROM student_enrollment_records WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY grades DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_id, course_name FROM student_enrollment_records WHERE grades >= 90 ORDER BY course_name ASC, student_name;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment_records WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%' ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS Total_Students, AVG(grades) AS Average_Grades FROM student_enrollment_records WHERE enrollment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM students;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT instructor, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM courses GROUP BY instructor HAVING COUNT(course_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM course ORDER BY course_id DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment JOIN enrollment_history ON student_enrollment.student_id = enrollment_history.student_id JOIN course ON enrollment_history.course_id = course.course_id;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date, grade FROM enrollment_history WHERE student_id = 3 AND grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM course ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM student_enrollment JOIN enrollment_history ON student_enrollment.student_id = enrollment_history.student_id JOIN course ON enrollment_history.course_id = course.course_id;

SELECT course_name, student_name, grade FROM course JOIN enrollment_history ON course.course_id = enrollment_history.course_id JOIN student_enrollment ON enrollment_history.student_id = student_enrollment.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credit FROM courses;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT grade_id, enrollment_id, grade_value FROM grades WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'ENROLLED';
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3 ORDER BY course_credit DESC;

SELECT students.student_name, courses.course_name, enrollments.enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT AVG(grade_value) AS average_grade, courses.course_name FROM grades JOIN enrollments ON grades.enrollment_id = enrollments.enrollment_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY courses.course_name;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT student_id, last_name, first_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students;
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, grade FROM enrollments;
SELECT grade_id, grade_description FROM grades;
SELECT department_id, department_name, department_head FROM departments;
